agentPreferences.description: Run commands with SQLite persistence. Tasks survive server restarts. Clean output.
tips: task_run waits for completion (default 30s timeout)
task_start + wait_for pattern for dev servers
task_list shows all tasks including from previous sessions

agentPreferences.description: Git operations: blame, history, commits, status, staging. Understand WHY code exists.
tips: blame_file shows intent behind each line
recent_changes for 'what broke?'
branch_diff for PR scope, changed_symbols for semantic diff
git_status → git_add → git_commit for committing

agentPreferences.description: Instant project orientation. Type, scripts, tech stack, structure. Auto-detects root.
tips: get_session_guide first to learn all MCP tools
get_quickstart for build/test commands
get_structure to understand directory layout

agentPreferences.description: Edit by function name, not line numbers. Auto-indexed. TS/JS/Python/Go/Rust.
tips: edit_symbol is more reliable than string matching
rename_symbol/move_file/move_symbol: use dry_run=true to preview
extract_function to reduce complexity
organize_imports to clean up after refactoring

agentPreferences.description: TypeScript type checking. Get errors, hover info, definitions. Verify edits didn't break types.
tips: get_diagnostics after edits to verify type safety
get_type_at_position for hover info
notify_file_changed before re-checking edited files
reload to discover new tsconfig.json files

agentPreferences.description: Run tests with structured results. Parse failures, map to source. Jest/Vitest/Node.
tips: run_tests for full suite, get structured results
get_test_failures for detailed failure info with source locations
rerun_failed for faster iteration on fixes

agentPreferences.description: Semantic code graph. Call chains, paths, symbol relationships. Full source in responses.
tips: Auto-initializes on startup for cwd
graph_get_symbol returns full source, no follow-up Read needed
graph_trace forward/backward for call chains
graph_find_dead_code to identify unreachable functions
